articles.title: Pawan didn't ask me to campaign, says Chiru!.. - Greatandhra
articles.description: It is now certain that megastar Chiranjeevi won’t be campaigning for his younger brother and Jana Sena Party president Pawan Kalyan, who is contesting the assembly elections from Pithapuram constituency in East Godavari district.
